text: Alf Hurley (15 May 1913 – 11 June 1991) was an Australian rules footballer who played for the Hawthorn Football Club, Fitzroy Football Club and St Kilda Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1913 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Hawthorn Football Club players Category:Fitzroy Football Club players Category:St Kilda Football Club players Category:Port Melbourne Football Club players
title: Alf Hurley
